title: Advantech WebAccess Remote Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to bypass authentication requirements on vulnerable installations of Advantech WebAccess. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability. 
The specific flaw exists within the ChkCookieNoRedir function. By providing arbitrary values to certain fields, an attacker can receive a session authentication cookie despite receiving an error message.
addtionnal_details: Advantech has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:http://ics-cert.us-cert.gov/advisories/ICSA-14-198-02
timeline:
2014-04-23 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2014-07-18 - Coordinated public release of advisory
